bibl.title: Cn. Domitius Philippus, praefectus vigilum, dux.
bibl.note: All the references are to a career as praefectus vigilum and dux (not as praefectus Aegypti), from A.D. 240 to A.D. 242.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the Twelfth International Congress of Papyrology

bibl.seg: Rea John, Cn. Domitius Philippus, praefectus vigilum, dux.
Proceedings of the Twelfth International Congress of Papyrology (Toronto, 1970) pp. 427-429.
All the references are to a career as praefectus vigilum and dux (not as praefectus Aegypti), from A.D. 240 to A.D. 242.
